channel.title: Pages on Environmentalist VIP
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Environmentalist VIP

item.title: About
item.description: This blog is for you, the silent majority who has no voice: You care about the environment, but you are too important to adjust your living standards or the way you go about your life. You want to project an image of a champion for the environment without putting any effort to actually save the environment. You long to be perceived by your friends as a warrior for the environment without sacrificing anything.
